com.github.katjahahn.tools.visualizer

Class Visualizer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.katjahahn.tools.visualizer.Visualizer

  • public class Visualizer
extends java.lang.Object
    Creates an image that represents the structure of a PE file on disk.

      • writeImage

        public void writeImage(java.io.File input,
              java.io.File output)
                throws java.io.IOException
        Writes an image to the output file that displays the structure of the PE file.

        The output image format is PNG.

        Parameters:
        input - the PE file to create an image from
        output - the file to write the image to
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if sections can not be read

      • writeImage

        Parameters:

        output - the file to write the image to

        Parameters:

        withPEStructure - show PE structure legend
